name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou
name_original: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou
description: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou is a console port of Higurashi When They Cry released on Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4. Hou includes all Higurashi content released to date, as well as some additional content, making a complete remastered collection.
